info.title: Readymarket API RESTful
info.description:
Complete REST API for Microsoft products marketplace. Includes products management, categories, users, MITEC payment processing, analytics, shopping cart and advanced authentication system.

Developed by: Salvador Arturo Rodriguez Loera

get.description: Gets a paginated list of all activities

post.description: Creates a new activity in the catalog

get.description: Gets the details of a specific activity by its ID

delete.description: Deletes an activity using soft delete
Permanently deletes an activity from the database

post.description: Restores an activity that was soft deleted
Activates or deactivates an activity

get.description: Gets a list of all active activities
Returns analytics data for the admin dashboard
Returns analytics data for stores
Returns top products by various metrics
Returns performance metrics for categories
Returns pricing analytics and distribution
Returns system health and integrity checks
Returns simple list of non-converted carts

parameters.name: hours
parameters.description: Hours of inactivity to consider abandoned

post.description: Records a detailed page view for analytics

get.description: Returns detailed page views analytics data

post.description: Records cart abandonment for analytics

get.description: Returns detailed abandoned carts data

post.description: Marks carts as abandoned after specified hours of inactivity
Records a search query with its results count and metadata
Register a new user account
Authenticate user and return access token
Revoke user access token

get.description: Get current authenticated user information

post.description: Change current user password
Verify user email with OTP code
Resend OTP verification code to email
Send password reset link to user email
Validate password reset token and get user info
Reset user password using token
Verify user account using OTP code
Resend OTP verification code to user

get.description: Returns list of billing information for the authenticated user

post.description: Restores a billing information record that was soft deleted
Sets a billing information record as the default for the authenticated user

200.description: Billing information set as default successfully

message.example: Billing information set as default successfully

get.description: Get the current user's cart or session cart if not authenticated

put.description: Update quantity or metadata of a cart item

delete.description: Remove a specific item from the cart

put.description: Update the specified category in storage

get.description: Returns paginated list of products for a specific category
Returns all categories for a specific store
Returns category statistics with product counts

get.summary: Get categories with products for header menu
get.description: Returns categories with prioritized products for the header navigation menu
Display a listing of all CFDI Usages.

parameters.description: Filter by applies to physical person (1/0)

parameters.description: Filter by compatible tax regime code

200.description: List of CFDI usages for the specified tax regime

get.summary: Get CFDI usages by person type

200.description: List of CFDI usages for the specified person type

tax_regime_ids.description: Array of tax regime IDs to sync

put.description: Cancels an order if it's still pending

get.description: Returns tracking information for an order
Returns detailed payment information for an order by order number
Returns order statistics for the authenticated user

post.summary: Process order in Microsoft Partner Center
post.description: Sends the order to Microsoft Partner Center for provisioning

400.description: Order cannot be processed (invalid status or other error)

post.summary: Process order and provision products in Microsoft Partner Center
post.description: Processes a pending order and creates the products in Microsoft Partner Center

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: ID of the order to process

message.example: Products provisioned successfully in Partner Center
Failed to create cart in Microsoft Partner Center

get.description: Retrieves the current status of an order and its provisioning details
Retrieves all orders with pending fulfillment status that need to be processed

post.description: Processes multiple orders at once for Partner Center provisioning

order_ids.description: Array of order IDs to process (max 10)

get.description: Gets the list of tax regimes with optional filters. This endpoint is public, no authentication required.

post.description: Creates a new tax regime

get.description: Gets the details of a specific tax regime. This endpoint is public, no authentication required.
Gets tax regimes organized hierarchically, ready to populate a select. Parents (relation=0) contain their corresponding children.

post.description: Changes the active/inactive status of a tax regime

get.summary: Get CFDI usages for a tax regime (PUBLIC)
get.description: Gets all CFDI usages available for a specific tax regime using the pivot table relationship

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Filter by active CFDI usages only

Records a new activity performed by the authenticated user. Super simple endpoint - just pass the activity_id and optional data.

get.description: Gets the activity history of the authenticated user

Gets summarized statistics of user activities

parameters.name: days
parameters.description: Number of days backwards for statistics

post.description: Super simple endpoint - just pass the activity ID in the URL and you're done. Ideal for quick logs.
